title: Andy the Spider
description: Andy and his sister Emily have a great life, until one day when Emily is kidnapped by Harry (the meanest and ugliest owl of the forest). Now it is up to Andy to find his sister before anything terrible happens. Along the way, Andy meets new friends that help Andy in his quest to find Emily. Once Emily is found and returned to Andy, that's when more problems arise. Harry wants what he had back and he's determined to get it. Nothing ever escapes from him, and it isn't going to start now. Can Andy and his friends keep Emily safe from Harry? Or will Harry come back for Emily and take her away forever?Join Andy and his friends on their first adventure....
author: Samantha Rindfuss
